activities: Global Meetings & Incentives is a meetings logistics company operating domestic and international, including EU/EEA and/or Switezerland, health care professional meetings.  Our clients require all meetings cature in depth data management including: attendee names, physician numbers, itemized spend and signatures.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Meeting data captured at health care professional meetings is entered manually by our staff and includes attendee name, physician number and cost to attened program
recoursemech: We are committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus
